name: Free Trader
description:
You are fan of board games and science fiction? And would like to find himself at the helm of the Millennium Falcon or a Firefly. Then the game for you. You are a new space trader, with a new ship and big bills to pay off, ships don't come cheap! You will explore new trade routes, trading
goods, fighting pirates and possibly getting rousted by the police. Hopefully while taking part in all of this adventure you'll earn enough Vectorium to make the monthly payments on the ship.
P.S. It is a really HARD game, there no press X to win. Only the coolest and lucky captains will reach victory. So good luck!

Creator of the board game Felbrigg Herriot.

2009 Golden Geek Best Print & Play Board Game Nominee
